title: You’ve made your legal declaration
pageHeader: You have made your legal declaration
paragraph1: Once all applicants have made their legal declaration, {leadExecFullName} can complete and submit the application.
paragraph2: {leadExecFullName} should get the grant of probate within 12 weeks of submitting the application. It can take longer if they need to provide additional information.
paragraph3: Contact {leadExecFullName} if you need an update on the application.
paragraph4a: Once you have the grant of probate, you can start dealing with the estate (opens in a new tab).
